answers.answer: This problem is not typical for diabetes or stroke.  Consult an ophthalmologist.Dr. O.

question: i had stroke in feb, also have type 2 diabetes.  my eyes do not adjust well fro light to dark and vise verse,  also get blurred vision .  have corrective lens,  he said then i had cataract forming.  does the cataract do this, or the remains if stroke. eyes hurt often.
title: blurred and dsrk
